sn37.32:1.4: idam, bhikkhave, pathamam thanam dullabham akatapunnena matugamena.
sn37.32:1.5: Patirupe kule jayitva patirupam kulam gaccheyyanti—
sn37.32:1.6: idam, bhikkhave, dutiyam thanam dullabham akatapunnena matugamena.
sn37.32:1.7: Patirupe kule jayitva, patirupam kulam gantva, asapatti agaram ajjhavaseyyanti—
sn37.32:1.8: idam, bhikkhave, tatiyam thanam dullabham akatapunnena matugamena.
sn37.32:1.9: Patirupe kule jayitva, patirupam kulam gantva, asapatti agaram ajjhavasanti puttavati assanti—
sn37.32:1.10: idam, bhikkhave, catuttham thanam dullabham akatapunnena matugamena.
sn37.32:1.11: Patirupe kule jayitva, patirupam kulam gantva, asapatti agaram ajjhavasanti puttavati samana samikam abhibhuyya vatteyyanti—
sn37.32:1.12: idam, bhikkhave, pancamam thanam dullabham akatapunnena matugamena.
sn37.32:1.13: Imani kho, bhikkhave, panca thanani dullabhani akatapunnena matugamenati.
sn37.32:2.1: Pancimani, bhikkhave, thanani sulabhani katapunnena matugamena.
sn37.32:2.4: idam, bhikkhave, pathamam thanam sulabham katapunnena matugamena.
sn37.32:2.5: Patirupe kule jayitva patirupam kulam gaccheyyanti—
sn37.32:2.6: idam, bhikkhave, dutiyam thanam sulabham katapunnena matugamena.
sn37.32:2.7: Patirupe kule jayitva patirupam kulam gantva asapatti agaram ajjhavaseyyanti—
sn37.32:2.8: idam, bhikkhave, tatiyam thanam sulabham katapunnena matugamena.
sn37.32:2.9: Patirupe kule jayitva patirupam kulam gantva asapatti agaram ajjhavasanti puttavati assanti—
sn37.32:2.10: idam, bhikkhave, catuttham thanam sulabham katapunnena matugamena.
sn37.32:2.11: Patirupe kule jayitva patirupam kulam gantva asapatti agaram ajjhavasanti puttavati samana samikam abhibhuyya vatteyyanti—
sn37.32:2.12: idam, bhikkhave, pancamam thanam sulabham katapunnena matugamena.
sn37.32:2.13: Imani kho, bhikkhave, panca thanani sulabhani katapunnena matugamena”ti.
